mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM( CHAT_ROOM_NO, SELLER_MEM_NO, BUYER_MEM_NO, ROOM_DATE, PRO_NO ) VALUES ( #{chat_room_no}, #{seller_mem_no}, #{buyer_mem_no}, #{room_date}, #{pro_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.MEM_ID as CHAT_MEM_ID FROM CHAT a INNER JOIN MEMBER b ON a.CHAT_MEM_NO = b.MEM_NO WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{CHAT_ROOM_NO} ORDER BY CHAT_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_ROOM_NO, CHAT_MEM_NO, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_DATE, CHAT_READ ) VALUES ( #{chat_room_no}, #{chat_mem_no}, #{chat_content}, #{chat_date}, #{chat_read} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC
